synopsis.text:
The Dream C Club, an Xbox 360 dating simulation game, is brought to life in a captivating two-volume DVD/CD collection featuring character songs and music videos. This anime reimagines the game's heroines in a two-dimensional graphic style, offering a fresh perspective on beloved characters.

Volume 1, titled 'Sweetx2☆Summer', introduces viewers to Amane and Setsu, while also featuring Rui, Reika, and an original short version of 'koi・ＫＯＩ☆week end'. Volume 2, on the other hand, takes viewers on a journey with 'real', 'Kanpai☆LOVE' featuring Riho and Nao, and concludes with 'Time Traveler' starring Airi and Mari.

Each volume comprises three engaging clips, ensuring a diverse and entertaining viewing experience. This collection is not just a visual treat but also a musical delight, making it a must-watch for fans of the game and newcomers alike.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
